plot: In the 1930s, many China women went to Singapore to work as odd job labourers. Many worked till they died, and others never had the chance to go home. This is the true life accounts of 2 of them, known as Samsui Women.
title: Samsui Women
plot_es: In the 1930s, many China women went to Singapore to work as odd job labourers. Many worked till they died, and others never had the chance to go home. This is the true life accounts of 2 of them, known as Samsui Women.
